summary: Comprehensive testing completed for VEXOR e-commerce website. Fixed critical SelectItem React error and validated all backend APIs and frontend flows successfully.
passed_tests: Backend API: 16/16 tests passed (100% success rate)
Homepage: Marquee banner, hero section, featured products (4 products)
Shop page: Product grid, category filter, sort options, pagination
Product detail: Navigation, product info, Add to Cart button
Cart functionality: Cart drawer, add to cart, empty cart state
All navigation flows: Homepage -> Shop -> Product Detail -> Cart
